sentences.sentence: My back is my bread, O my gracious liege!
sentences.translation: 我就是靠我的背吃饭呀，我仁慈的皇上！

sentences.sentence: Is it not I that speed his death penalty hence, my liege?
sentences.translation: 我加速了他的死刑不是吗，陛下？

sentences.sentence: Tis matter of small weight, my liege, yet will I touch upon it, an' it please your Grace.
sentences.translation: 这是件小事，皇上，但陛下如果愿意听，我就说一说吧。
